==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
{{zh-compound|端|午|opening|seventh [[earthly branch]]}}. The name refers both to the original day of the festival, the first seventh-day ({{zh-l|午日}}) in the fifth lunar month ({{zh-l|五月}}) of the traditional [[w:Chinese calendar|Chinese calendar]], and the month itself which was also known from its position in the earthly branch cycle as {{zh-l|午}}.
